content: {"id": "27eaad49-ee1d-41c7-a0e4-375a364da2f6", "name": "Food Not Bombs Lake County & East Side Cleveland", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food Not Bombs Lake County and East Side Cleveland is a local chapter of a national network of food sharing groups. We believe food is a human right and poverty is a form of violence. We want to see resources shifted away from endless war, and toward meeting basic human needs. We share free fresh produce and bread, no questions asked, YEAR ROUND: First & third Sunday every month, 3-4PM- Daniels Park and Dam ( 38401 Johnnycake Ridge Rd, Willoughby, OH 44094 ) NORTH side of Johnnycake Ridge Rd. (The parking lot with the pavilions, NOT the baseball fields.) Second & fourth Sunday of every month- corner of East 64th & St. Clair in Cleveland (6321 St. Clair Ave.) NOTE: If there is a fifth Sunday of the month, there is NO FOOD SHARE. To volunteer, folks can message us in IG @foodnotbombs_cle FB @fnblc call/text 440-340-3663 or email us FNBeastCLE@gmail.com and send us their email address to be invited to a virtual orientation. Chip in on CashApp  https://cash.app/$EastSideCleFNB or Square (no account required)  https://square.link/u/YuMBYVE7 ", "email": "fnbeastcle@gmail.com", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": "", "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "phones": [{"number": "(440)3403663", "type": "voice"}], "location": {"latitude": 41.5250217, "longitude": -81.6466164}, "regular_schedule": []}
